Title: Existential Crisis
Writer: Michael Schur (created by), Andrew Law, Kate Gersten (executive story editor), Cord Jefferson (story editor), Andrew Law (story editor), Daniel Schofield (story editor)
Actors: Kristen Bell, William Jackson Harper, Jameela Jamil, D'Arcy Carden
Plot: Tahani throws a dinner party to impress. Eleanor and Jason both have to lend a hand when things don't go as planned.
